com.alexkasko.krakatau

Class KrakatauLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexkasko.krakatau.KrakatauLibrary

  • public class KrakatauLibrary
extends Object
    Frontend library for java classfiles operations: disassembling, assembling, decompilation and compilation. Uses eclipse compiler for compilation and krakatau python library (through jython) for other operations
    Author:
    alexkasko Date: 9/29/13

             Collection<String> fqClassNames,
             File outDir)
               throws KrakatauException
        Decompiles list of fully qualified classes from specified classpath
        Parameters:
        classpathFiles - list of classpath entries (.jar files or directories)
        fqClassNames - list of fully qualifies class names
        outDir - output directory
        Throws:
        KrakatauException

      • compile

        public void compile(List<File> sources,
           int langLevel,
           Collection<File> classpathFiles,
           File outDir,
           Writer errorWriter)
             throws KrakatauException
        Compiles list of source files (or directories)
        Parameters:
        sources - list of source files (or directories)
        langLevel - java language and bytecode compliance level (3 - 8)
        classpathFiles - list of classpath entries (.jar files or directories)
        outDir - output directory
        errorWriter - error writer
        Throws:
        KrakatauException
